## swapEndianness variable

SwapEndianness swaps the endianness of the value encoded in buf. If buf is Big-Endian, the result will be Little-Endian and vice-versa.

**Signature:**

```typescript
swapEndianness: (buf: Uint8Array) => Uint8Array
```
